name: Beatnik: Epic Fall
description:
Make the dude fall and dodge the icy obstacles.

How long can you last out?

Check our reviews:

'Loved it, great game. Challenging. Addictive. Well designed. Artsy.'

'It's a GREAT game. Awesome! And it's really hard, when you try, it gets you SO dizzy...'

'Simple, straight forward. Addictive! Keep falling!'

'Awesome! I play it after school everyday to get higher up and im gonna ask my friends to play.'

'This game will make you crazy. It's so hard, but so much fun!'

'Excellent Game! Just got to play it on my Tita's iPad Mini a while ago. And got immediately hooked to the game!'
